headline.main: CRIMEAN DRIVE SEEN AS A FLANKING MOVE; British Believe Nazis Seek to Take Rostov From Rear

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 3 (U.P.) -- Military experts believed today that the Germans planned to drive across Crimea to the Caucasus and turn north to come upon the oil port of Rostov from behind and outflank the whole Russian Don River defense line.
abstract: London reaction to German Crimean drive; Brit study German tactics
snippet: LONDON, Nov. 3 (U.P.) -- Military experts believed today that the Germans planned to drive across Crimea to the Caucasus and turn north to come upon the oil port of Rostov from behind and outflank the whole Russian Don River defense line....
